collectible.title: Sanako's Panties
collectible.subtitle: A cute style in a brand for young women
collectible.text: Sanako caught you watching her dress after the game. She gave you a wink and pressed her panties into your hands. "Oh no, I left my panties behind," she whispered into your ear. She then ran a finger slowly down your chest. "Come by the Furukawa Bakery early sometime. I think you have something you need to give me."

collectible.title: Sanako's Glasses
collectible.subtitle: The Perfect Disguise
collectible.text: "Sanako Isogai" is the alias of Sanae Furukawa, the youthful mother of Nagisa Furukawa. She briefly wore these glasses as a disguise to date a highschool boy. To his surprise, she was a much more experienced girlfriend than he had expected...
collectible.unlock: Play three games with Sanako and other characters in school uniform. Don't invite Nagisa.
